snippet: A mathematical error may mean that more than 3,000 retired teachers are being overpaid in their pension checks each month, and the case is still in court.
lead_paragraph: A mathematical error may mean that more than 3,000 retired teachers are being overpaid in their pension checks each month, and the case is still in court.

headline.main: A Tale of 3,400 Retired Teachers and a Possible $90 Million Math Mistake
headline.print_headline: A Tale of 3,400 Retired Teachers and a Possible $90 Million Math Mistake
